body:
Hey, everyone! Today is Star Wars day in case you didn't notice! I myself am a huge fan so I decided to make this. This thread is for any discussions about Star Wars EU, Disney, The Sequels, etc.

I've got a question for you guys. What do you think about the new Star Wars movie (The Force Awakens) based off of the trailers?

(Discuss anything, ^ is just a question)
body_tagged:

(Discuss anything, ^ is just a question)
title: Revenge of the Fifth!

replies.body: I'm a pretty big fan of the Star Wars series, so I'm really hyped for movie 7. :D
replies.body_tagged: I'm a pretty big fan of the Star Wars series, so I'm really hyped for movie 7. :D

replies.body: Hyped for no.7, I think they'll do a good job of it, even if the original fans think it will be ruined. Personally, big Star Wars fan ;)

replies.body: I can't seem to find a reliable source, but I heard that Star Wars episodes 1, 2, and 3 are not canon anymore...is this true?
replies.body_tagged: I can't seem to find a reliable source, but I heard that Star Wars episodes 1, 2, and 3 are not canon anymore...is this true?

replies.body: I'm not a Star Wars fanatic and I don't know much about the lore, but I like sci-fi and explosions so I'm pretty excited!
replies.body_tagged: I'm not a Star Wars fanatic and I don't know much about the lore, but I like sci-fi and explosions so I'm pretty excited!

replies.body: so much mistakes in all star wars movies xP

replies.body: Hopefully EA won't mess up the new Star Wars Battlefront
replies.body_tagged: Hopefully EA won't mess up the new Star Wars Battlefront

replies.body: From what I've seen, it'll be a disappointment... I automatically lost all my hype when they said clones and droids won't be in the game.
replies.body_tagged: From what I've seen, it'll be a disappointment... I automatically lost all my hype when they said clones and droids won't be in the game.

reply_to.body: Hopefully EA won't mess up the new Star Wars Battlefront

replies.body:
I love Star Wars and especially love the original trilogy.

I just hope episode 7 wont be disappointing compared to the prequel's (lets face, its boring, especially episode 2. The lines made me cringe so bad.) I guess the only good one there out of the 3 is Episode III because i love the Battle of Courasant.


Really love the lore of Star Wars and i hope Ep 7 will not dissappoint
